reviewText:
My 2.5 year old son loves Max and Ruby, but I can see older kids liking this series too.  My husband likes it because the music isn't annoying. Each disc has 12 episodes, which is equivalent to 4 TV shows.  The beginning song plays after every 3 episodes.  Another reviewer said it wasn't in color, which is ridiculous.  Of course it is!  At the time I bought this, it was about $2 cheaper at WalMart, but it was just easier to buy it from Amazon.  Also, when I bought this the item description didn't list the titles, so here they are.
Party Time with Max & Ruby contains:
Max's Birthday
Max's New Suit
Goodnight Max
Bunny Cakes
Bunny Party
Bunny Money
Max's Bug Salad
Ruby's Beach Party
Super Max to the Rescue
Hide & Seek
Max's Breakfast
Louise's Secret

Afternoons with Max and Ruby contains:
Max's Froggy Friend
Max's Music
Max Gets Wet
Max's Dragon Shirt
Max's Rabbit Racer
Roger's Choice
Ruby's Hiccups
The Big Picture
Ruby's Stage Show
Ruby's Piano Practice
Max's Bath
Max's Bedtime
bought this dvd for my granddaughter who is 2 1/2 yrs old and loves max and ruby.. she watches it over and over again.  i like that there are so many episodes on it.
Bought this item because my son loves watching Max and Ruby.  I got tired of the reruns on TV that I decided to start collecting the DVDs.
very disappointed don't understand why this would be like that...shouldn't have to do anything but play it and it should be in color

Orderd this DVD for my son's 3 rd Birthday. He loves Max & Ruby and was very excited and pleased with his DVD. The entire ordering transaction was very easy and shipping was very timely. We actually recieved our item a day earlier than estimated. I would definitely recommend this product, as well as Amazon yo all of our friends and family. And will be purchasing more items from Amazon again in the future.
It is so much simpler than running from store to store searching for items, especially harder to find items.
This is an awesome video that my toddlers (1 & 3) love to watch over and over again!! Max and Ruby never disappoint!
My daughter loves it.
Grandson loved the movies.
Three-year-old grandson loves Max and Ruby.  He is a lot like Max. I think this is a wonderful program for little kids.
Wonderful!! My kids in my classroom LOVE IT! And, therevis a,ways a good story line!
Grandson loves them.
Grandson loves these videos and watches them over...and over...and over....  you're welcome daughter! ;o)
GREAT GIFT
Received in expected time frame , kids love Max & Ruby!
Great Christmas gift for children.
my grandson love it
Good transaction.  Grandbaby loved them.
Love it!
My 4,25,27 year olds love Max and Ruby.
This DVD is fantastic!! It has tons of episodes making it a real favorite of my 3 year old! You will not regret this purchase and you will not find it cheaper anywhere!!!
Only for young people and old people.
My Grandson loves this!
Bought for my granddaughters, they love 'em!

Great value! This includes a lot of episodes. Our daughter loves this show. Ruby can be a little taxing but Max is just super cute with his expressions and one word proclamations. We love him! The episodes included are very cute. This show is great for toddlers. It is easy to follow, the subject matters interest and excite my 3 year old and teaches you to listen to people. Max is always trying to tell Ruby something and she doesn't pay attention til the end. Lol most of the episode the adult in me is screaming "RUBY!! FOCUS!! HE WANTS YOU TO USE THE RED CANDY AS LAVA FOR YOUR VOLCANO!!!!!" Haha but ruby figures it out at the end, usually. Very cute show for kids. I tolerate it as a parent.
My granddaughter loves it!

This is just what we needed for our grandson to watch in the car.  Right now he is obsessed with Max and Ruby.  It keeps him interested and happy.  Because they are episodes and not a long movie he can easily watch on short trips.  Double pack was extra bonus.
lovely show, keeps 3.5 yr old happy!!
Grandson loves it
Was very pleased with it!
great
Love max & ruby
Takes up much less space but the Target knock-offs are just as good and much less money.
It was just what I wanted! My 3 year old daughter loves this show! Delivered fast too
Great collection of shows -- my granddaughter loves it!!!!
Awesome set..and wonderful price!  Kids  it!

Excellent!  The Max and Ruby stories never dissapoint. They are humorous while still instilling the values of patience and working together.
3yr old loves this movie, came sooner than expected also!
I am very pleased with these Bennie Babys. I bought them for my 18 month old granddaughter and she loves playing with them espically when she is watching the Max & Ruby show...tc
Great Christmas gift for kid.

My toddler, 2 1/2, loves this series. Santa brought these for Christmas to add to her little collection of max and ruby dvds. Seems to like these as much as the other two dvds she has from this series (2 Christmas max and ruby dvds).
My 2 1/2 year old granddaughter loves the movies and wants to see them over and over.
My grandson loves Max and Ruby and has watched this many times and enjoyed it each time.
Wonderful, innocent and non-violent episodes that my grandson loved watching again and again.  Even I saw humor in them and smiled at Max's antics.  :-)
Max and Ruby are always fun to watch and very educational too. We even find ourselves watching these wonderful video's.
Daughter loves max and ruby!
My grandkids all love Max and Ruby, this was a great price for 2 dvd's; sound is great - perfect for a range of ages
Fast shipping and great entertainment for little ones. One of the cutest cartoons!
